These rules, effective from first january two thousand and twenty five, will impact e-commerce transactions across platforms like Flipkart and Amazon. unnormalised: One key change involves mandatory Additional Factor Authentication (AFA) for online purchases above the specified threshold. Customers may need to use OTPs or biometric verification in addition to their card details. NPCI is working to streamline UPI transactions, targeting a transaction value of Rs. 1 lakh per day for verified users.
